data.meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.
data.sentence: The word قَلِيلًا comes from the root ق ل ل and is associated with the meanings: to be few in number, small in quantity, rare. qalilun - few, little, small, rare, seldom. aqall - fewer, poorer. qallala - to appear as few.
The word مِنْهُ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From
The word أَوِ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: half, reach its middle/midst, divide a thing into halves.
data.sentence: The word نِصْفَهُ comes from the root ن ص ف and is associated with the meanings: half, reach its middle/midst, divide a thing into halves.

data.meanings: to diminish, decrease, run low, lessen, cause loss or deficiency, consume, fall short, waste, abate.
data.sentence: The word انْقُصْ comes from the root ن ق ص and is associated with the meanings: to diminish, decrease, run low, lessen, cause loss or deficiency, consume, fall short, waste, abate.
